title: Premiere: JOYYA – Seven
content:
This debut track from London duo JOYYA arrives with one of the most addictive hooks of the year.

Having been writing and producing together for the best part of three years, Ben Dancer and David Pullen have now released Seven, the first taste of their exciting new project. Songwriting wise there are elements of the likes of indie pop outfits Foster the People and courtship., whilst managing to maintain a decidedly British feel to it. With more music expected next month, including a track featuring saxophonist John Waugh (The 1975), and plans for live shows in the works, the duo are all set to hit the ground running. Check out Seven below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
